spell_list.description: Whenever the raid strikes a death blow, the caster's group will gain increased attack speed and doublecast. This also has a very small chance to increment when attacking. This increments up to 25 times. It is dispelled when any group member dies. Does not persist through zoning.
spell_list.description_pvp: Whenever the raid strikes a death blow, the caster's group will gain increased attack speed and doublecast. This also has a very small chance to increment when attacking. This increments up to 25 times. It is dispelled when any group member dies. Does not persist through zoning.

effect_list.description: On any combat or spell hit this spell may cast Mamba of Blades on target.  Lasts for 15 minutes.  Triggers about 0.2 times per minute.
Increases Attack Speed of group members (AE) by 4.0
Dispelled when a group member dies.
Increases Doublecast Chance of group members (AE) by 0.1%
Increases Spell Weapon Attack Speed of group members (AE) by 2.0
On a death blow this spell will cast Mamba of Blades on target.  Lasts for 15 minutes.
Increases Attack Speed of group members (AE) by 4.0
Dispelled when a group member dies.
Increases Doublecast Chance of group members (AE) by 0.1%
Increases Spell Weapon Attack Speed of group members (AE) by 2.0

spell_list.name: Mamba of Blades
